forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High 53F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the evening becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low 48F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
